description: News about Raymond W. Kelly, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Raymond W. Kelly
title_page: Raymond W. Kelly - The New York Times
maintext:
Justifiable Homicides, Taken Off the Books, Alter a Murder Tally
Each year, there are a handful of shootings that are not counted by the New York Police Department as crimes, although they may have led to fatalities.
